mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_Code, seller_Id, goods_Name, goods_Cate, goods_Price,goods_Sta, goods_Des, goods_Pic) values (goods_seq.nextval, #{seller_Id},#{goods_Name}, #{goods_Cate}, #{goods_Price}, #{goods_Sta} ,#{goods_Des}, #{goods_Pic})
insert into trade (trade_Code, goods_Code, seller_Id, trade_State) values (tbl_goods_seq.nextval, #{goods_Code}, #{seller_Id}, 1)
mapper.select: select trade_Code, goods_Code, seller_Id, buyer_Id, trade_State from trade where goods_Code = #{goods_Code}
select goods_Code, seller_Id, goods_Name, goods_Cate, goods_Sta,goods_Price, goods_Des, goods_Pic, goods_Date from goods order by goods_Code desc
mapper.update:
update goods set goods_Name = #{goods_Name}, goods_Cate = #{goods_Cate}, goods_Price = #{goods_Price}, goods_Sta = #{goods_Sta}, goods_Des = #{goods_Des}, goods_Pic = #{goods_Pic}
where goods_Code = ${goods_Code}
